reviews.text: From the moment I walked into this quaint, charming place, I decided to always come back here...I travel frequently, and often times I stay in not-so-great places...This place is so memorable. Igor and Nina were simply outstanding hosts, always accommodating, present, made me feel right at home...The rooms are extremely clean and lovingly decorated, and the food is really excellent too. Villa Marija is not to be missed! Trust me, you will always want to go back!
reviews.title: Fantastic! The best B&B in Belgrade!!
Definetely the best option in Belgrade
reviews.text: I found Belgrade to be an exceptional place to be at; the food, the people and the cafes were great. The airport is small and efficient.
I had to choose a hotel for a wedding I attended, like most of the people who were also invited. Luckily I chose Vila Marija.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hosts in a Nice Small Intimate Hotel

likes.disliked: — The Hotel was great - It was only Belgrade I didn't like

reviews.text: Let me begin with the downside: Vila Marija sits in a residential neighorhood, without restaurants or pharmacies or museums close by. (I like to be close to the action.) But the incredible personal attention by Igor, who mans the front desk and seemingly does everything else at the inn -- and with a smile -- more than offsets the isolated location.
reviews.title: A welcoming place to stay

reviews.text: Vila Marija is especially nice if you spend a few days there because Igor will be sure to try to meet all of your needs -- in my case, that meant serving me cold yogurt, cold milk and a hot omelette for breakfast. He also willingly printed maps and several documents that I needed to carry with me. He also stored a traveling ice pack in the kitchen freezer that I used for a bum shoulder.
reviews.title: Most friendly & Best value in Belgrade!

reviews.text: You couldn't get this kind of personal attention in a large chain hotel.
reviews.title: Comfortable, friendly, helpful

reviews.text: The room was fine. The Internet connection was good. My only complaint: I had to sit down to take a shower.
reviews.title: The most friendly place I've ever stayed in!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Even though the inn was a bit isolated, taxis did come promptly. Igor also directed me to a restaurant about a 10-minute walk away where I ate several times.
reviews.title: A great value welcoming little hotel that is clean, comfortable and handy to bus routes.
